data.name: Description
data.detail: A gigantic, armoured, arachnid-like pred- ator beast. It has no concept that the war it was designed to fight ended aeons ago, and continues to tear apart anything that enters into its mountainous domain.

data.name: Titanic Actions
data.detail:
Scylla can take three Titanic Actions, choosing from the options below. Only one Titanic Action may be chosen at a time and only at the end of another Pilot’s or NPC’s turn. Scylla regains spent Titanic Actions at the start of their turn.

• Scylla moves one Range Band.
• Scylla makes a single Scythe Attack. This does not have the Multi-Attack Trait.
• Scylla makes a Tail Sweep Attack (Costs 2 Titanic Actions).

data.name: Scythe Attack
data.info: Range: Close // Damage 4 SP // Melee // Multi-Attack (2)
data.detail: Scylla stabs with its forearms attempting to pierce it’s prey.

data.name: Ambush Predator
data.detail: Unless detected, Scylla always acts first in combat.

data.name: Armour Plating x 3
data.detail: When Scylla takes damage, instead destroy a layer of Armour Plating and negate all of the damage and any effects.

data.name: Climb
data.detail: Scylla can effortlessly climb over difficult and vertical terrain, rocky surfaces, and other obsta- cles.

data.name: Tail Sweep
data.detail: Scylla makes one giant sweeping attack with their tail. This hits every target within Medium Range, dealing 3 SP damage on a hit. Targets hit are knocked Prone and gain the Vulnerable Trait.
